mapper.sql: module_id, module_name_en, module_name_cn, prod_id, ver_code, parent_module_id, output_type, output, start_command, svn_path, module_desc, is_used, delete_flag, remark, creator, create_date, modifier, modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into mnt_prod_module ( module_name_en, module_name_cn, prod_id, ver_code, parent_module_id, output_type, output, start_command, svn_path, module_desc, is_used, delete_flag, remark, creator, create_date, modifier, modify_date ) values ( #{moduleNameEn}, #{moduleNameCn}, #{prodId}, #{verCode}, #{parentModuleId}, #{outputType}, #{output}, #{startCommand}, #{svnPath}, #{moduleDesc}, #{isUsed}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{modifier}, #{modifyDate} )

insert into mnt_prod_module ( module_name_en, module_name_cn, prod_id, ver_code, parent_module_id, output_type, output, start_command, svn_path, module_desc, is_used, delete_flag, remark, creator, create_date, modifier, modify_date ) values
( #{item.moduleNameEn}, #{item.moduleNameCn}, #{item.prodId}, #{item.verCode}, #{item.parentModuleId}, #{item.outputType}, #{item.output}, #{item.startCommand}, #{item.svnPath}, #{item.moduleDesc}, #{item.isUsed}, #{item.deleteFlag}, #{item.remark}, #{item.creator}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.modifyDate} )
mapper.update:
update mnt_prod_module
module_name_en = #{moduleNameEn},
module_name_cn = #{moduleNameCn},
prod_id = #{prodId},
ver_code = #{verCode},
parent_module_id = #{parentModuleId},
output_type = #{outputType},
output = #{output},
start_command = #{startCommand},
svn_path = #{svnPath},
module_desc = #{moduleDesc},
is_used = #{isUsed},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag},
remark = #{remark},
creator = #{creator},
create_date = #{createDate},
modifier = #{modifier},
modify_date = #{modifyDate}
where module_id = #{moduleId}
